title: SeaMo: A Multi-Seasonal and Multimodal Remote Sensing Foundation Model

abstract: Remote Sensing (RS) data contains a wealth of multi-dimensional information crucial for Earth observation. Owing to its vast volume, diverse sources, and temporal properties, RS data is highly suitable for the development of large Visual Foundation …
